meanings.definition: A short introductory piece of music before the main part
meanings.sent1: The concert began with a lively intro that got everyone excited.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy listening to the intro of a song before the lyrics start.
meanings.sent3: The intro to the music was so short, it felt like a musical sneak peek.
meanings.sent4: The intro played by the orchestra was like a musical appetizer before the main course.
meanings.sent5: The intro set the tone for the entire performance, leaving us eager for more.

meanings.definition: An introduction to a book or other written work
meanings.sent1: The intro of the novel provided a glimpse into the story that followed.
meanings.sent2: I always read the intro of a book to understand the author's perspective.
meanings.sent3: The intro of the book was like a friendly handshake from the author.
meanings.sent4: The intro of the story was a doorway into a new world waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The intro of the book was like a map guiding readers through the upcoming adventure.

meanings.definition: A brief spoken or written explanation at the beginning of a performance or event
meanings.sent1: The emcee gave a quick intro before the play started to set the scene.
meanings.sent2: I always appreciate a good intro that helps me understand what's about to happen.
meanings.sent3: The intro to the event was like a trailer for the main show.
meanings.sent4: The intro written on the program was a sneak peek into the evening's entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The intro provided by the host was like a friendly welcome to all the guests.
